snippet: A new study has found that hedge funds are largely at peace with the new rules resulting from the Dodd-Frank law, even as much of the financial industry chafes under its restrictions.
abstract: A new study has found that hedge funds are largely at peace with the new rules resulting from the Dodd-Frank law, even as much of the financial industry chafes under its restrictions.

headline.main: Hedge Funds Pleased With Some Parts of Dodd-Frank, a Study Finds
